songs.title: So Many Stars
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
So many stars
So many, so many stars
Can you believe it?
Fate has conceived it
Of all the places we could be

Uhhh Uhhh Ahhh!

We are here
We are free

Uhhh Ahhh!

[Chorus]
Of all the places we could be
We are here, we are together
Of all the places we could be
We are here and we are free

My friend
Fate has conceived it

And all the stars
They are aligned

And we can see them all tonight
Open your eyes

[Chorus]
Of all the places we could be
We are here, we are together
Of all the places we could be
We are here and we are free

My friend
Fate has conceived it
Fate has conceived it

Of all the places we could be
We are here, we are together
Of all the places we could be
We are here and we are free

[Outro]
Oh yeah!
Fate has conceived it
Fate has conceived it
